txt.en: You have completed Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire -- Tier 3 and put a swift end to the plans of Brathar Crack-helm and the Dourhands.

After escaping the second downfall of Angmar during the War of the Ring, the Dourhands, led by Brathar Crack-helm, have laid claim to a powerful relic seized long ago by the Witch-king and secreted away to the depths of Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire.
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire -- Leading the Charge
Complete Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire -- Tier 3
